_source.text: About two months after my husband passed, I started back up again on meds, and my numbers are back up to where they were before my holiday or even better than.

text: About two months after my husband **passed**, I started back up **again** on meds, and my numbers are back up to where they were before my **holiday** or even **better** **than**.

_source.text: After certain days passed, he went and visited him again, and asked how it was with him, and he answered much better than tofore.

text: After **certain** days **passed**, he went and visited him **again**, and asked how it was with him, and he answered much **better** **than** tofore.
